movie.title: The Happiest Days of Your Life
movie.title_english: The Happiest Days of Your Life
movie.title_long: The Happiest Days of Your Life (1950)
movie.description_intro: Nutbourne College, an old established, all-boys, boarding school is told that another school is to be billeted with due to wartime restrictions. The shock is that it's an all-girls school that has been sent. The two head teachers are soon battling for the upper hand with each other and the Ministry. But a crisis (or two) forces them to work together.
movie.description_full: Nutbourne College, an old established, all-boys, boarding school is told that another school is to be billeted with due to wartime restrictions. The shock is that it's an all-girls school that has been sent. The two head teachers are soon battling for the upper hand with each other and the Ministry. But a crisis (or two) forces them to work together.

cast.name: George Cole
cast.character_name: Junior Assistant Caretaker at Ministry of Education

movies.title: Santa, Jr.
movies.summary: Father Christmas's son tries to follow in his father's footsteps, but gets arrested while delivering presents.
movies.description_full: Father Christmas's son tries to follow in his father's footsteps, but gets arrested while delivering presents.
movies.synopsis: Father Christmas's son tries to follow in his father's footsteps, but gets arrested while delivering presents.

movies.title: Asterix: The Secret of the Magic Potion
movies.title_english: Asterix: The Secret of the Magic Potion
movies.title_long: Asterix: The Secret of the Magic Potion (2018)
movies.summary: Following a fall during mistletoe picking, Druid Panoramix decides that it is time to secure the future of the village. Accompanied by Astérix and Obelix, he undertakes to travel the Gallic world in search of a talented young druid to transmit the Secret of the Magic Potion.
movies.description_full: Following a fall during mistletoe picking, Druid Panoramix decides that it is time to secure the future of the village. Accompanied by Astérix and Obelix, he undertakes to travel the Gallic world in search of a talented young druid to transmit the Secret of the Magic Potion.
movies.synopsis: Following a fall during mistletoe picking, Druid Panoramix decides that it is time to secure the future of the village. Accompanied by Astérix and Obelix, he undertakes to travel the Gallic world in search of a talented young druid to transmit the Secret of the Magic Potion.

movies.title: Lost Treasure of Jesse James
movies.summary: A backwoods team of Missouri kids race to solve a 100 year old mystery and save their friends in this family friendly action adventure. Chased deep into ancient caves they must escape treasure hunters hot on their trail or be lost forever.
movies.description_full: A backwoods team of Missouri kids race to solve a 100 year old mystery and save their friends in this family friendly action adventure. Chased deep into ancient caves they must escape treasure hunters hot on their trail or be lost forever.
movies.synopsis: A backwoods team of Missouri kids race to solve a 100 year old mystery and save their friends in this family friendly action adventure. Chased deep into ancient caves they must escape treasure hunters hot on their trail or be lost forever.

movies.title: Unexpected
movies.summary: An inner-city high school teacher discovers she is pregnant at the same time as one of her most promising students and the two develop an unlikely friendship while struggling to navigate their unexpected pregnancies.
movies.description_full: An inner-city high school teacher discovers she is pregnant at the same time as one of her most promising students and the two develop an unlikely friendship while struggling to navigate their unexpected pregnancies.
